text: Increase utilisation and reduce carbon footprints of data centres. And yeah, there are zombies too! Loved the talk by @holly_cummins at #KubeCon EU. https://t.co/IKLPl42ZIr

author.name: Peeyush Gupta
author.description: Sr. Developer Advocate @Digitalocean. Ex @IBM. CKA. Talk to me about Containers, Kubernetes, Storage and all things cloud!
